Name: Automatic war
About the game: 'Automatic war' is a cool auto battler. You are not in control of the battle process itself, but you can influence the outcome of the battle before the battle begins. Choose wisely who will fight. Some units are ranged, some fight at close range, some only slow down the enemy and deal no damage. Don't forget about the position of your fighters! If the exploder breaks into your army, then the outcome of the battle will not be on your side. Tactical thinking and the will to win will decide the outcome of your battle! Main features: Dynamic gameplay Nice pixel-art visuals Many dangerous enemies Interesting gameplay 50 levels! Steam Achievements support
